original_title: 輪姦計画 美人秘書編 朝倉ここな
overview: I kidnapped a woman I wanted to fuck! The target is a beautiful secretary of a business partner! Suddenly I was kidnapped, and when I noticed it, it was already too late, and I immediately made a decision! She cries, asks for forgiveness, and eventually goes crazy with mental collapse! "Wow, Hidee! I put it inside without notice! (laughs)".
title: Group-Sex Planning. The Beautiful Secretary Edition. Kokona Asakura
